init_mpi.f90

00001 module init_mpi
00002     use mpi 
00003     use read_namelist
00004     implicit none
00005     save
00006  
00007     integer :: mpi_iErr, mpi_nProcs, mpi_pId, mpi_nP
00008     integer :: mpi_start_, mpi_end_, mpi_fh
00009     integer :: mpi_status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00010     !integer, parameter :: LONG = selected_int_kind(9)
00011     !integer(kind=LONG), parameter :: nP = 10000
00012     integer :: nP_wall, nP_bad, nP_off_vGrid, 
00013         nP_badWeight
00014     
00015 contains
00016     subroutine start_mpi ()
00017         implicit none
00018     
00019         call mpi_init ( mpi_iErr )
00020         call mpi_comm_size ( MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_nProcs, mpi_iErr )
00021         call mpi_comm_rank ( MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_pId, mpi_iErr )
00022     
00023         mpi_nP  = nP / mpi_nProcs
00024         mpi_start_   = mpi_nP * mpi_pId + 1
00025         mpi_end_ = mpi_start_ + mpi_nP - 1
00026 
00027         write (*,*) 'Division: ', mpi_start_, mpi_end_
00028         
00029         !write(*,*) 'Proc id: ', mpi_pId, ' np range: ', mpi_start_, mpi_end_
00030      
00031     end subroutine start_mpi
00032     
00033     subroutine stop_mpi ()
00034         implicit none
00035         
00036         call mpi_finalize ( mpi_iErr )
00037 
00038     end subroutine stop_mpi 
00039 
00040 end module init_mpi
